Package model.business

Class DepartmentProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.business.DepartmentProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DepartmentEdit, DepartmentRead, DepartmentWrite
    public class DepartmentProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements DepartmentEdit
    responsible for managing a readers-writers lock pattern on a Department instance

      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> queue
      queue consisting of sessionIDs

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DepartmentProxy​(Department department)

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void addToQueue()
      adds a session to the queue
      IMPORTANT: dependent on ModelManager's getCurrentSessionID() to get the session ID
      IMPORTANT: dependent on ModelManager's departmentAcquired() to notify the caller session if its already first in the queue
      int getID()
      delegates the request to the real subject, since reading does not need a lock
      java.lang.String getName()
      delegates the request to the real subject, since reading does not need a lock
      boolean isAcquired()
      returns true if the Caller ClientHandler Thread is first in the queue meaning it has the lock and write privilege
      IMPORTANT: dependent on ModelManager's getCurrentSessionID()
      (package private) void removeFromQueue()
      removes a session from the queue
      IMPORTANT: dependent on ModelManager's getCurrentSessionID()
      IMPORTANT: dependent on ModelManager's departmentAcquired() to notify the next session of the queue if the first one gets removed
      void update​(java.lang.String name)
      checks if the Caller ClientHandler Thread is first in the queue, and if yes, it delegates the request to the real subject
      IMPORTANT: dependent on ModelManager's getCurrentSessionID()

        public boolean isAcquired()
        returns true if the Caller ClientHandler Thread is first in the queue meaning it has the lock and write privilege
